response.original_title: The Most Dangerous Woman in America
response.overview: Documents the emerging science of public health and the social, ethical, and legal dilemmas it posed at the turn of the 20th century concerning Mary Mallon, AKA: Typhoid Mary, who was identified as a healthy carrier of typhoid fever.
response.title: The Most Dangerous Woman in America
